law.catch_line: In accordance with its regulations, the Board may reinstate the license of an individual who has fai...
law.text:
In accordance with its regulations, the Board may reinstate the license of an individual who has failed to renew the license for any reason if the individual:
otherwise is entitled to be licensed;
complies with each continuing education requirement that the Board sets for this purpose; and
pays to the Board a reinstatement fee set by the Board.
